subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan's Capital and Other Famous Cities
question_en: Which is the capital of Rajasthan and which are some of its famous cities?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी और इसके कुछ उच्चारिताओं के नाम
explanation_en: Rajasthan has Jaipur and Jodhpur as two of its capital cities. Udaipur and Bikaner are also famous cities in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में जयपुर और जोधपुर कांचना है। Udaipur और Bikaner भी राजस्थान में एक ज्ञानी श्रेणी है।
explanation_en: Jaipur and Jodhpur are the capital cities of Rajasthan. Udaipur and Bikaner are also famous cities in Rajasthan. These cities are known for their rich history and culture.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में जयपुर और जोधपुर कांचना है। Udaipur और Bikaner भी राजस्थान में एक ज्ञानी श्रेणी है।

explanation_hi.subject: Rajasthan
explanation_hi.question_en: Which are some of the historically significant places in Rajasthan?
explanation_hi.question_hi: राजस्थान में कुछ इस्लीक के रचनाएं हैं।

question_en: Which forts were built during the reign of Maharaja Rao Jodha?
question_hi: माहारा राऊँ जॉद् के समभारा माहारा जॉद्

A_en.explanation_en: Chittorgarh Fort, also known as Chittorgarh Fort, was built during Maharaja Rao Jodha's reign.
Amber Fort, also known as Amer Fort, was built during the time of Maharaja Man Singhji.
Gag Meena Fort, also known as Meena Fort, was built during the Rajput Dynasty era.
Laxminagar Fort, also known as Laxminagar Fort, was built during the Rajput Dynasty era.
Kumbhala Fort, also known as Kumbhala Fort, was built during the Rajput Dynasty era.
Taj Mahal, also known as Taj Mahal, is a famous monument built during Mughal era.
